doc.description:
Calibrate magnetometer using UKF Online calibration of the magnetometer sensor using an UKF approach. It is required to redirect the magnetometer measurements to this module before using them in your estimation filters. In order to do that, define the mag id for your filter (for example AHRS_MLKF_MAG_ID for the mlkf ahrs filter) to MAG_CALIB_UKF_ID.
For more information see TRICAL project page (https://www.github.com/sfwa/TRICAL).

define.name: [AHRS/INS]_XXX_MAG_ID
define.description: Select correct input mag for your estimation filter (AHRS or INS), replace XXX by your filter name as defined in sw/airborne/subssytems/abi_sender_ids.h

define.name: ABI_BIND_ID
define.description: Bind to a specific source for input data, broadcast ID by default

define.name: INITIAL_STATE
define.description: Initial state to be used by filter. There is an option to send the state from settings, after which the state will be send through the PAYLOAD_FLOAT message.

define.name: HOTSTART
define.description: Read calibration on initialization and Write calibration periodically to file (only for Linux-based boards)

define.name: HOTSTART_SAVE_FILE
define.description: Hotstart save file (only for Linux-based boards)

define.name: VERBOSE
define.description: Enable terminal verbose mode (only for Linux-based boards)
